name: counter
description: A simple, complete ExpressJS app which counts upwards

scripts.test: TEST=true CONSOLE=true NODE_ENV=mocha_sqlite PORT=8851 DEBUG=true mocha tests
scripts.test_pg: NODE_ENV=mocha knex migrate:latest && TEST=true CONSOLE=true NODE_ENV=mocha PORT=8851 DEBUG=true mocha tests
scripts.coverage: TEST=true CONSOLE=true NODE_ENV=mocha_sqlite PORT=8851 DEBUG=true node ./node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover _mocha -- tests

author: Morgan Patch <me@lyonesgamer.com>
